Article.ArticleTitle: TDP-43 Nuclear Bodies: A NEAT Response to Stress?

Abstract.AbstractText: In this issue of Molecular Cell, Wang et al. (2020) investigate stress-induced nuclear condensates of the RNA-binding protein TDP-43, uncovering a protective function for these granules as well as an RNA-dependent mechanism for scaffolding them.
